TaxSeason.meta_description: Tax season has begun and I'm here to help! To ensure a quick and efficient filing, make sure you have the following required documents ready for your TAXES
TaxSeason.section_description: Tax season has begun and I'm here to help! To ensure a quick and efficient filing, make sure you have the following required documents ready for your 2025 TAXES
TaxSeason.section_description2:
REQUIREMENTS:

INCOME:
• W2 Forms or 1099-NEC 

CLIENT:
• Social Security 
• Driver License 
• Marriage Certificate (if filing married) 
• Form 1095-A

DEPENDENTS:
• Social Security
• Birth Certificate
• Proof of Residence (school letter, vaccinations, etc.)
TaxSeason.section_description3:
Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or need help with your tax return.
I'm here to help you maximize your return and ensure everything is in order!

PrivacyPolicy.section_description:
SMS Communication Policy for MV Consulting LLC

 Objective
Our company assists individuals in preparing immigration documents. SMS communication is used exclusively for:
•       Addressing customer inquiries.
•       Sending reminders for scheduled appointments.
•       Informing customers about important deadlines and dates.

Customer Authorization
All customers voluntarily provide their phone numbers to receive SMS updates when they contact us through our business cards, Instagram page, or other channels. By reaching out to us, customers agree to receive text messages for the purposes outlined above.

Message Frequency
Text messages will only be sent as needed. Typically, customers will receive messages in the following cases:
•       When they have questions regarding their immigration process.
•       When an appointment is scheduled.
•       When a reminder is required for an important deadline.

On average, customers can expect to receive 4 to 6 messages per month, depending on their needs and the progress of their immigration case.

Opt-Out Process
Customers can stop receiving text messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any message. Once we receive the request, we will immediately cease sending further messages, except to confirm the cancellation.

Data Security
We do not share or sell customer phone numbers or personal information with third parties. Customer data is securely stored, and all SMS communications are conducted in compliance with applicable privacy and data protection laws.

Message and Data Rates
Standard message and data rates may apply based on the customer's mobile carrier. Any costs related to sending or receiving text messages are the responsibility of the customer.

Business Identification
All SMS messages will clearly identify our company as the sender. Our contact information, including our phone number and Instagram handle, can be found on our business cards and social media profiles.

Support Hours
We respond to SMS inquiries Monday through Friday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Messages sent outside of these hours will be addressed as soon as possible on the next business day.

AboutUs.section_description:
We are a comprehensive services company in immigration and legal areas, with over 10 years of experience in the market.

 Our goal is to be a strategic ally for people seeking to improve their quality of life and wellbeing through immigration and legal services. We strive to provide quality service with friendly and professional treatment, helping people reach their maximum potential in work and personal life by providing immigration and legal services, so they can enjoy a full and successful life.
AboutUs.section_description2: Our mission is to help people reach their maximum potential in work and personal life by providing immigration and legal services, so they can enjoy a full and successful life.
AboutUs.section_description3: Our vision is to be a leading company in the market, providing immigration and legal services, so that people can enjoy a full and successful life.
